channel.title: Need Help With Some Editing On My Server
channel.description:
OKay So i downloaded a source to a server, but im not sure how to edit it...
In the .java logs its all Changed and i Compile but when i run and log on, nothing has changed
Like When i log on, it says the server source and all the ORIGNAL stuff, but i want it to be mines
Also the admin doesnt change
Can someone help me if i am doing something wrong

item.title: Need Help With Some Editing On My Server
item.dc:creator: @Sexii_Jadii Sexii Jadii
item.description:
@Sexii_Jadii wrote:

You are using a 508 source, to edit this go to src\palidino76\rs2\io\login.java and change the owners name and server name and also change th same things in frames.java that is also in directory src\palidino76\rs2\io

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Some Editing On My Server

item.source: Need Help With Some Editing On My Server

item.title: Need Help With Some Editing On My Server
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

In client.java, it will have 2 different things, both have a code that says owner, co owner etc. You have to keep going down until you see the second one. It will look something like this…

//Left hand side sendQuest("Owner: Owner", 15895); sendQuest("Co-Owner: co owner", 15897); sendQuest("Players Online: @gre@"+players, 15898); sendQuest("Made by: maker", 15899); //sendQuest("Wild status:", 15900); // Used for Safe zones! sendQuest("", 15901);
This is the first one. You want to change the second one…

sendQuest("@red@~ @bla@~@red@s@bla@c@red@a@bla@p@red@e@bla@~ @red@~", 15950); sendQuest("", 15960); sendQuest("", 15961); sendQuest("Server created by - Owner", 15959); sendQuest("", 15951); sendQuest("Reputation: @whi@" + Rep, 15952); sendQuest("Latest Update - type Forums", 15953); sendQuest("Have Fun...", 15954); sendQuest("Read Rules!", 15955); sendQuest("", 15956); sendQuest("", 15957); sendQuest("", 15958);

That is client.java alone and thats just the beginning. There is a lot of information you will want to change. Also, what does your compiler say?

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Some Editing On My Server
